derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: via Latin from Greek rhinokerōs, from rhis, rhin- 'nose' + keras 'horn'

entry.def: A rhinoceros is a large Asian or African animal with thick grey skin and a horn, or two horns, on its nose.

means.word_mean: 1. massive powerful herbivorous odd-toed ungulate of southeast Asia and Africa having very thick skin and one or two horns on the snout
